UpdateRoot.testTitle: Suppression of STCA conflicts due to NTZ processing (associated NTZ is inactive)
UpdateRoot.testObjective:
This test checks that SKYRADAR does not flag alerts as suppressed when NTZ (Non Transgression Zone) associated to the track is inactive.
Conditions for STCA suppression due to NTZ are:
1) The associated NTZ area is active.
2) The status of the NTZ areas manager is equal to AVAILABLE.
3) Heading gap between each aircraft and the runway axis is lower than a CSP: MAX_DELTA_HEADING = 20 degrees.
4) Current distance between the aircraft is kept above a VSP: MinimalDistance=0.
5) Each track is located within a different NOZ associated with an offline defined parallel approach pair of runways.
6) The parallel approach pair is in INDEPENDENT mode.
7) The flag STCA_PARALLEL_APP_FPL_CHECK_FLAG is set to false or the runway of each track coupled FPL (if assigned) matches the runway linked to the NOZ where the track is located.;
- 1st step defines an offline NTZ area set to inactive, this should NOT suppress the raised STCA conflict.
- In 2nd step, the NTZ area is set to active, this should suppress the raised STCA conflict.
- In 3rd step, the NTZ area is set back to inactive, this should NOT suppress the raised STCA conflict.
CSP: MAX_DELTA_HEADING=20 degree and VSP: MinimalDistance=0. STCA_PARALLEL_APP_FPL_CHECK_FLAG = true. parallelApproachPair::modeOnStartup=INDEPENDENT.
All conditions, except the 1st one, are met to suppress STCA conflict due to NTZ processing.
UpdateRoot.actionComment: 2 tracks are located in their respective NOZ and are also close enough to generate a STCA conflict. NTZ areas manager is set to true via a specific online command at time 7.
UpdateRoot.actionDescription:
2 tracks are close enough to generate a STCA conflict. All the conditions to suppress the STCA conflict are fulfilled except the first one (NTZ is inactive for this step).
As a result a STCA conflict should be raised with no suppressed status.

TestResult.resultDescription: A STCA conflict is raised with no suppressed status.
TestResult.nextActionComment:
In order to simulate an update of the NTZ datapage by the PRM instance, a NTZ datapage update is sent at time 12 in which NTZ area is set to active.
Tracks are positioned in order to generate a STCA conflict.
TestResult.nextActionDescription: The 2 tracks should generate a STCA conflict and an update of the NTZ datapage sets the NTZ to active. This configuration should allow SKYRADAR to generate a STCA conflict with suppressed status.

TestResult.resultDescription: A STCA conflict is raised with suppressed status.
TestResult.nextActionComment:
In order to simulate an update of the NTZ datapage by the PRM instance, a NTZ datapage update is sent at time 16 in which NTZ area is set back to inactive.
Tracks are positioned in order to generate a STCA conflict.
TestResult.nextActionDescription: The 2 tracks should generate a STCA conflict and an update of the NTZ datapage sets the NTZ to inactive. This configuration should allow SKYRADAR to generate a STCA conflict without suppressed status.

TestResult.resultDescription: A STCA conflict is raised without suppressed status.
